title: Marcel Kittel and Tony Martin are making children’s bikes at upstart brand li:on — seriously | Eurobike 2023
content:
Your favorite German ex-pros have put a good deal of thought into making safer, more sustainable kids’ bikes. 

Read the full article at Marcel Kittel and Tony Martin are making children’s bikes at upstart brand li:on — seriously | Eurobike 2023 on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
